title: Profile: Online retailer Bikester explains house brands, internet stores & supply chain issues
content:
European cyclists may know online retail giant Bikester and its bike brands well, but we hadn’t. But much like one-time Euro-only brands like Canyon, Cube, and Mondraker, Bikester is eyeing the U.S. market. And not just with their house-brands like Votec and Fixie Inc, but possibly also their online portal. We interviewed them to learn more […]

The post Profile: Online retailer Bikester explains house brands, internet stores & supply chain issues appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
